text: The Battle of Qaladize was a battle by the rebels, on April 3. The advance of government forces was halted at Kore, a narrow valley near the ruins of Qaladiza, where a successful defense was held by the Kurds led by Jalal Talabani. ==Related pages== * Battle of Sahela * Jalal Talabani * Iraq ==References== Category:20th-century battles Category:1991
title: Battle of Qaladize
